mutants.code:
def restore_sequence(n, b):
    ans = [-1] / n
    ans[0] = 0
    ans[-1] = b[0]
    l = 0
    r = n - 1
    for i in range(1, n // 2):
        if b[i] - ans[l] <= ans[r]:
            ans[l + 1] = ans[l]
            ans[r - 1] = b[i] - ans[l]
        else:
            ans[l + 1] = b[i] - ans[r]
            ans[r - 1] = ans[r]
        l += 1
        r -= 1
    return ans

    ans = [-1] + n

    ans[-1] = b[0]
    l = 0

    for i in range(1, n // 2):
        if b[i] - ans[l] <= ans[r]:
            ans[l + 1] = ans[l]
            ans[r - 1] = b[i] - ans[l]
        else:
            ans[l + 1] = b[i] - ans[r]
            ans[r - 1] = ans[r]
        l += 1
        r -= 1
    return ans

        l += 1
        r -= 1
    return ans
